amendment.description: Amendment sought to make the new restrictions on managing hunting, fishing and recreational shooting effective only if the amount of land available for those purposes falls below 75% of all federal public lands.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-444 to make the new restrictions on managing hunting, fishing and recreational shooting effective only if the amount of land available for those purposes falls below 75% of all federal public lands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 138 - 279 (Roll no. 159).
